divs: Sighting DetailsOn my way home from work, heading east on Rt 16 from Newark, I was near my turn off to Hanover when I glanced over to the right of the highway and saw 2 large shining spheres hovering above the tree line. They were so bright that they illuminated the woods below. Suddenly a ray of light shot out of one of them and struck the other knocking it back slightly. Then they quickly flew off side-by-side in the direction of the radio tower in Newark. I've never seen anything accelerate that fast. From the to the time it took off til it disappeared over the horizon took only about 3 seconds.
